meanings.sent1: The simple math problem was explainable to the students.
meanings.sent2: The teacher made the difficult concept more explainable with examples.
meanings.sent3: It was quite explainable why the cat chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The mystery of the missing keys became explainable once they were found in the fridge.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's theory was so explainable that even a child could understand it.

meanings.definition: Able to be clarified or made understandable.
meanings.sent1: The instructions were not very explainable, causing confusion among the group.
meanings.sent2: The diagram made the complex process more explainable to the team.
meanings.sent3: It was oddly explainable why the dog barked at the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The solution to the puzzle was as explainable as connecting the dots.
meanings.sent5: The concept was made explainable through the use of colorful illustrations.
